## Toy Example

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(PFCI)
toy <- simulate_pfci_toy(p_obs = 50, gamma = 0.1, n = 200, seed = 1)
fit <- pfci_fit(toy$X)
fit
plot_pag(fit)
```
